entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34587 crashes Crossgen2 compilation with an assertion failure #63818
  • Consider using Mono.Posix in test code instead of directly P/Invoking to libc #63811
  • WASM startup time optimization tracking issue #63809
  • SocketsHttpHandler does not preserve request header format #63808
  • ICorProfilerCallback::ObjectsAllocatedByClass does not work anymore since dotnet 6 #63806
  • ILGenerator computation of maxstack is too conservative #63805
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests have issues with BigInteger on netfx #63802
  • Extend `System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat` so it can replace the Xamarin in-box `nfloat` for .NET 7 #63801
  • Developers should be able to write custom async converters #63795
    7.0.0
  • Developers should have access to System.Text.Json's default internal converters #63791
    7.0.0
  • DiscardBufferedData does not skip BOM when the position is reset to the beginning #63789
  • `NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged` event leaks threads on Linux #63788
  • NativeAOT: Application crash during exception stack building #63785
  • NativeAOT: Crash with assertion during obj file emit. #63779
    Future
  • Cannot publish WASM project `wasm-ld : error : cannot open output file (...)\wasm\for-publish\dotnet.wasm: no such file or directory` #63786
  • Segfault in gc_heap::get_region_plan_gen_num for a frozen object #63778
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd/dlbigleakthd.sh #63774

Closed

  • Cannot regenerate ref assembly in System.Runtime.Intrinsics #63815
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34587/Runtime_34587/Runtime_34587.sh #63716
  • Possible deadlock in ConfigurationManager in .NET 6 #61747
    7.0.0
  • Official Docker ASP.NET Core 1.1 runtime image #63573
  • Multiple applications not correctly detecting .Net Desktop Runtime 6.0.1 (x64) #63812
  • Detecting the user or the system closing .NET Core console application #7120
    Future
  • Regression in Blazor WebAssembly startup time #60349
    6.0.1
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeEndEntityWithInvalidRevocationName(pkiOptions: IssuerRevocationViaOcsp | AllEndEntityRevocation | RootAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder) #61238
  • Help - Using compiled library DLLs directly instead of nupkg errors out at compile time #63169
    Future
  • fsharp code gives incorrect result in .NET 6 when compiled in release. #62103
    6.0.2
  • Can 'system. Resources. Extensions' support lower versions of the. Netframework. For example, 4.0 #62282
  • Supporting Nano Server and Windows Desktop #36670
    Future
  • api container is getting shut down #49579
    Future
  • Certificate errors on .NET5/6 on Debian 11 (bullseye-slim) #62810
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Dsa.Tests.DSASignVerify_Stream.InvalidKeySize_DoesNotInvalidateKey #63773
  • [API Proposal]: Activity.IsStopped (functionality required to conform to OpenTelemetry specification) #63353
    7.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.22060.9] grandnode2 thrown exception due to EntriesCollection property missing from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.dll #63731
  • ReferenceHandler.IgnoreCycles doesn't work with Custom Converters #51715
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose TryRead() as public on JsonConverter #60904
    7.0.0
  • Custom JsonConverter is ignored on [FromQuery] action parameter in ASP.NET #63677
  • Investigate ways to extend deserialization support for arbitrary collection types #38514
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Serialization Regression in NET6 (Net5 worked) #61044
    7.0.0
  • Provide option for the serializer to treat IEnumerables like objects with members #1808
    Future
  • can't launch another application as administrator mode #63784
  • System.Text.Json serialize exception with AllowNamedFloatingPointLiterals #63740
  • Add SqlTypes members to remove SqlClient internal access hacks #51836
  • Libraries tests 7.0 (master) cross build failed for tizen arm64 #63122

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Produce ILC rsp in separate target #63820
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable the Runtime_34587 regression test with GH issue #63818 #63819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify string.{Last}IndexOfAny and span.{Last}IndexOfAny #63817
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #63816
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Fix profiling objectsallocatedbyclass #63814
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum cons… #63813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63807
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix OpenSSL 3 reporting an OutOfMemoryException for missing private key #63804
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx #63803
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Restrict parallelism in LLVM FullAOT compile, to prevent OOM #63800
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix issues with verify_regions, clear_batch_mark_array_bits. #63798
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid additional local created for delegate invocations #63796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • don't Flush readonly MemoryMappedViewAccessor on disposal #63794
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Ignore conversion exceptions during dictionary construction #63792
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Reduce the cost of creating a MemoryMappedFile #63790
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Prevent crash if stack trace has function pointer #63787
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for libraries testing with NativeAOT #63781
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fold S.S.C.Csp into System.Security.Cryptography #63775
    area-System.Security
  • Fix a few IL tests using the namespace syntax without an actual namespace #63772
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • More duplicate projects under JIT/Methodical/NaN to delete #63771
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Build all packages on source-build even when in servicing #63755
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable superpmi-collect pipeline on macOS arm64 #63691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move localloc/common library under JIT folder #63510
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete unused method #63797
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove string[] args from Main methods under JIT/Methodical #63770
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Missing test files #63148
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.2
  • Fix typo in SRM package description #63782
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Make ObjectiveC tests in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests check exit code for remote execution #63769
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test bug
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-codeflow
  • Introduce Activity.IsStopped Property #63713
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • Disable annoying warnings in the repro project #63777
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix a style issue. #63776
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • MemoryMappedFile: don't check for file existence if there is no need #63754
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Remove errors during first run of runpaltests.h #62642
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: yet another OSR stress mode #62980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Regex FindFirstChar optimization for a literal after an atomic loop #63477
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Extend regex switch alternation optimization to IgnoreCase #63756
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Improve reductions for Regex empty / nothing nodes #63695
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Improve use of {Last}IndexOf{Any} in Regex loops #63428
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Improve Regex UpdateBumpalong optimization for non-atomic and lazy loops #63398
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Begin using the xplat hardware intrinsics in BitArray #63722
    area-System.Collections
  • Increase default HostOptions.ShutdownTimeout value to 30 seconds #63712
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63702
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add ProcessLinkerXmlBase to NativeAOT #63666
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add IsKnownConstant jit helper and optimize 'str == ""' with str.StartsWith('c') #63734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary string allocation in HttpRuleParser.GetHostLength #63641
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Perform some minor code cleanup of the System.Numerics and System.Runtime.Intrinsics namespaces #63753
    area-System.Numerics
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono] Hot Reload: initial push to support adding lambdas #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [WIP]Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Actually properly type primary selectors #63752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Align rva fields in reflection emit #63430
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Use generic collections in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implementation #63315
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • "MOffset" size estimate fix #63766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for ref field support #63659
    area-Meta
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63596
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [Group 6] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.UserSecrets` #63700
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json` #63694
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-maui] [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #63628
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for StepThroughAttribute #63679
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix escaped strings for TryGetDateTime(Offset) #63534
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Set zero (infinite) options timeout in case of Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan #63733
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Avoid allocating byte array when setting ALPN list on Linux #63674
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When installing workloads, hide manifest updates from customers #23446
    6.0.3xx
  • NETSDK1147 Change this error message to recommend a dotnet workload restore #23445
    6.0.3xx
  • NETSDK1147 only lists the first missing workload #23444
    6.0.3xx
  • .NET CLI - If a runtime ID is passed through OS flag, a non-descriptive error message is returned #23433
  • Issue with dotnet build/restore of .NET project when a path to the project contains symbolic link #23430

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23440

Merged

  • Respect opt-outs from dotnet/msbuild#7008 #22719

  • Taparik/backport2 #23431

Updated

  • Build Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks for netfx during source-build #23266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quick info needs to show signatures of anonymous delegates. #58871
  • It looks like some of the OrganizeImports tests are either flaky, or culture dependent when executed on CoreClr #58867
  • Linking System.Memory as an analyzer dependency can have a significant performance impact #58863
  • IDE0063 removes #pragma statements between using and opening bracket #58861

Closed

  • Re-enable MetadataReference integration test #55711
    17.2.P1
  • Unexpected formatting warning for a space between a `new` modifier and a tuple type syntax. #56498
    17.1
  • Does .NET still support CSI? #58588
  • Crash in solution sync with transitive reference #52578
    17.1
  • InvalidCastException from AbstractAddParameterCheckCodeRefactoringProvider`5.UpdateDocumentForRefactoringAsync #58811
    17.2
  • Debugger crashes while trying to access a multidimensional array by executing the code step by step #57895
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Create solution on the main thread in integration tests #58873
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clone source from mirror for DartLab integration tests #58872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove places where the compiler is swallowing exceptions #58870
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Stack Trace Explorer to our searchable options #58869
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify SolutionEventMonitor #58868
    Area-IDE
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Steps to investigate CI flakiness with async-streams tests #58864
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • CS8600: possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • (Port to 17.1) Avoid cyclic references during incremental project update #58858
    Area-IDE
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Merge pull request #57132 from CyrusNajmabadi/branchId3" #58856
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add additional nested ambiguity note to GetTypeByMetadataName #58854
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Expand support for context variables #53068
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow patch releases of the SDK to be used #58865
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Avoid cyclic references during incremental project update #58720
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid unnecessary array creation #58821
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove formatting suppression for tuple syntax #58810
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Perform progression search in two phases. #58785
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add "Utf8 String Literals" to the feature list #58851
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Clarify breaking change requirement for constructor in 'struct' with field initializers #58812
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update VisualStudioCacheVersion #58852
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not return empty nodes in the refactoring helpers service. #58830
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add GlassTestsHotReloadService external access #58456
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add OutVariableArgumentProvider for 'out' parameters #53049
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Support basic end-to-end scenarios for converting string constants to UTF8 byte representation. #58849
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Formatter options refactoring - step 1 #58807
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce the memory usage of InheritanceMarginTarget #58175
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Fix race in WorkCoordinator when handling document reanalysis #58820
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Update to ICSharpCode.Decompiler 7.1.0.6543 #53304
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Enable CA1822 in Visual Studio layer #50569
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Community, Needs UX Triage
  • draft: dummy change to see what's affected by this code path #58833
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [draft] IDE response to raw string literals #58846
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary lock access setting UIContexts in the workspace #58828
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Port 58785 to dev17.1 #58853
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Fix param-nullchecking crash related to EmbeddedTypesManager #58825
    Area-Compilers
  • Backport SpillSequence Fix to 17.1 #58788
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE
  • Mark APIs as shipped #58776
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Please help add Blazor components for Fluid Framework #39536
  • Blazor .NET 6 with Native Dependency cannot build without administrator permission. #39532
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 6.0.1 Update not working #39531
    6.0.x
  • How to deploy a Windows Service in VS2019 #39530
  • The Web Project Description Error ,OpenAPI OR OpenAI？ #39529
  • Publish BLAZOR WASM with native File Reference SQLite failled #39528
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor is breaking build. We do not use Blazor. How to get rid of it. #39526
    6.0.x
  • Extremely High CPU and RAM usage even when idle #39525
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Inconsistent return from API while using IISExpress in Visual Studio 2022 #39524
  • Quarantine GOAWAY_Received_SetsConnectionStateToClosingAndWaitForAllStreamsToComplete #39520
    Test failures
  • Using Bootstrap 4 data-dismiss="alert" causes error when navigating to another page #39518
  • Blazor Server Access IP Address #39517
  • Dotnet 6 ommits If-None-Match Request header making ETag usage impossible #39516
  • signalr.min.js Uglify error #39515
  • External Google login breaks when logging from mobile device where there are multiple google accounts #39513
    .NET 7 Planning
  • SignalR TypeScript Client - The next event handler is not called if the previous event handler removes itself #39512
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf improvement: single_query #39510
  • Hot reload still not working for cshtml #39508
  • Blazor RemoteAuthenticatorView OnLogInSucceeded event firing multiple times #39507

Closed

  • Use given model nullability in razor pages #37510
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server - OnAfterRenderAsync not called on page refresh #39535
  • InstallVisualStudio.ps1 pulls wrong Windows SDK version #36165
  • Test Feature Request Issue #39534
  • "ASP.Net Core with React.js" template does not have a full/proper implementation of Reactstrap out-of-the-box, or as part of the demos. #39533
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #39511
  • [Test Failure] Reset_BeforeResponse_Resets #29126
    Test failures
  • Polymorphic binder on collection attempts to bind an extra element #39461
  • [Blazor server 6.0] httpContextAccessor.httpcontext is null when fallback to Long Polling #39485
  • Perf improvement: updates #39496
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39497
  • Hot reload not working on .cshtml (converted project) - Workound found but unsure why it's needed #39111

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 'using' warning for test files #39537
  • Test install scripts update #39527
    area-infrastructure
  • [WIP] Update tests for ARM64 #39523
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update Windows 10 SDK to 18362. #39422
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine failing test #39521
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Feature Request Issue Template #39473
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine Reset_BeforeResponse_Resets #39447
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • chore (package.json) : Update packages to latest #39460
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Detect HTTP/2 connection sent to HTTP/1.1 endpoint #39402
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr
  • Add ConfigureHttpJsonOptions for M.A.Htt.Json.JsonOptions #39502
    area-runtime
  • Avoid logging unsupported alternative for complex type binding #39353
    area-mvc
  • Use view buffers during pre-rendering #39465
    area-mvc
  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Refactor (WebJS) - Fix some ESLint warnings #39408
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [WIP] ANCM + Arm64 + helix #39420
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-14

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `mono.android-arm` workload fails to install #4146
  • [Windows] Margin on children of VerticalStackLayout doesn't work without resizing window #4145
  • Shell FlyoutWidth wrong first load on Windows #4144
  • Custom theme ResourceDictionary not working #4143
  • Grid width stretches off the page #4142
  • VisualStateManager: Changing the Style dynamically messes up the styling of the visual states #4139
  • XAML Intellisense cannot resolve working stuff like in Xamarin.Forms #4137
  • Wrong results searching .NET MAUI project templates #4136
  • ContentView: Setting the ControlTemplate dynamically causes the control to disappear #4135
  • Create Default ResourceDictionary for all Color properties inside controls #4132
  • Add a gitignore file to the Maui template in VS 2022 #4131

Closed

  • CSS gradients not working #4041

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix Switch color issues #4134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Invalidate GraphicsView if the FlowDirection changes #4133
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4130
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • ListView Handler for WinUI #3916
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • GridLayout -> Grid to reduce confusion #3865
    proposal/open, area/layout 🔲

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is efcore inheritance (TPT) supported if the entities are being mapped to views? #27192
  • Add a pubternal way to clear ServiceProviderCache #27189
    Backlog

Closed

  • Query: Compiled Queries: Support "non-rooted" query expressions #7016
    7.0.0
  • SqliteDataRecord.GetStream only works with 32-bit keys #27138
    7.0.0
  • EF Core materializes projection property as object with default values #26873
  • Scaffold single alternate key as a primary key in the EF model #24369
    Backlog
  • Migrate from EFCore5 to EFCore6 - my first migration adds annotations for some properties in every single table. Why? #27121
  • Stored procedures called multiple times in miliseconds #27101
  • Migrations creates shadow key on entities with primary and foreign key relationship of the same name when it is not needed #27032
  • dotnet ef migrations add does not recognize data annotation Key #26992
  • Make context.Database.Migrate able to find migrations using an assembly name and namespace #26957

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.8-pre20220111224339 #27191
  • [release/6.0] Store ApplicationServiceProvider in a WeakReference #27190
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Merged

  • fix: #27138, stream with 64-bit PK #27187
    auto-merge, community-contribution
  • There's no escape from those cold north winds #27050

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Match joined tables properly when lifting for group by aggregate #27170
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
